title: Upbeat Ambient Game Background Loops Vol 1
description: 25+ loopable Upbeat Ambient tracks to enhance your game or project. Perfect for casual and relaxing games!
longDescription:
Upbeat Ambient Game Background Loops Vol 1

Looking for high quality professionally produced original upbeat ambient music for your game or project that can be easily looped? Then look no further! Perfect for casual, puzzle and relaxing games this pack of 25+ loopable tracks fits any need for subtle, catchy music to enhance your game or project and make it stand out. All tracks are profesionally produced and mastered to provide the best quality product for your game or project.

technicalDetails:
All tracks provided in WAV format ready to use.

Number of Audio Wavs: 26

Number of Audio Cues: 26

Sample rate / bit rate: 44Khz Stereo / 16bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 20:50

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 32-bit, Windows 64-bit, Android, Gear VR, HoloLens 2, HTML5, iOS, Linux, MacOS, Nintendo Switch, Oculus, PlayStation 4, Steam VR, Windows 32-bit, Windows 64-bit, Xbox One

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
